meanings.definition: A loose-fitting garment worn for sleeping or lounging.
meanings.sent1: I love to wear my soft pajama to bed.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pajama for her sleepover.
meanings.sent3: The cat snuggled up in the pajama left on the chair.
meanings.sent4: The fog enveloped the town like a cozy pajama.
meanings.sent5: The pajama felt like a warm hug as she drifted off to sleep.

meanings.definition: A pair of loose-fitting pants worn for sleeping.
meanings.sent1: He put on his favorite pajama before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: She folded her pajama neatly in the drawer.
meanings.sent3: The pajama danced in the wind on the clothesline.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled like buttons on a pajama in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the pajama brushed against her skin as she slept peacefully.
